get.description: Get the consolidated free-busy of all users of an organization

parameters.description: Overrides the time zone of the request
parameters.name: x-timezone

parameters.description: Padding in minutes to add before and after busy times
parameters.name: padding

parameters.description: Duration of each slot in minutes
parameters.name: slotDuration

parameters.description: Minimum time of day in ISO date string

anyOf.description: Minimum time of day in ISO date string

parameters.name: startDate

parameters.description: Maximum time of day in ISO date string

anyOf.description: Maximum time of day in ISO date string

parameters.name: endDate

parameters.description: Earliest time of day (UTC) (applied per day) (e.g., 9:00)
parameters.name: earliestTime

parameters.description: Latest time of day (UTC) (applied per day) (e.g., 17:00)
parameters.name: latestTime

parameters.description: Requested earliest time of day (time zone of the request) (narrows down the admin-defined window) (e.g., 10:00)
parameters.name: requestedEarliestTime

parameters.description: Requested latest time of day (time zone of the request) (narrows down the admin-defined window) (e.g., 16:00)
parameters.name: requestedLatestTime

start.description: Start time of the time range in ISO format

end.description: End time of the time range in ISO format

padding.description: Padding in minutes to add before and after busy times

slotDuration.description: Duration of each slot in minutes

startDate.description: Start of the time range to scan for availability (inclusive)

endDate.description: End of the time range to scan for availability (inclusive)

earliestTime.description: Earliest time of day (UTC) to consider for scheduling on each day within the range (e.g., 9:00)

latestTime.description: Latest time of day (UTC) to consider for scheduling on each day within the range (e.g., 17:00)

requestedEarliestTime.description: Requested earliest time of day (time zone of the request) to narrow down the scheduling window (e.g., 10:00)

requestedLatestTime.description: Requested latest time of day (time zone of the request) to narrow down the scheduling window (e.g., 16:00)
